title: Can't post on some boards
body: I can't post comments/ start a new discussion on some boards, notably the Team Recruitment one. It says I have to be Lvl 7 or higher. I can't even upvote. What level does that refer to? I've been Level 30 on league for quite a while now, and I haven't found anything about ''forum levels''. {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body:
Sometimes your Summoner and Boards profiles fall out of sync and the boards cannot see what level you actually are. Most of the time a discussion post like this forces a sync and resolves the issue, which seems to be the case here.

Happy posting!

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BTll4Klu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-06T21:50:09.042+0000)
>
> Sometimes your Summoner and Boards profiles fall out of sync and the boards cannot see what level you actually are. Most of the time a discussion post like this forces a sync and resolves the issue, which seems to be the case here.
> 
> Happy posting!

Thanks, yeah it fixed itself!
